targets.rawSql: select count(distinct id) from coproductionprocess;

panels.title: T005b Number of users per co-production process
T005e Number of active users vs time period

targets.rawSql:
select count(distinct schema_used)
from coproductionprocess;

panels.title: T014 Number of co-prod process schema types

targets.queryText:
SELECT count( distinct( id ))
FROM catalogue.public.interlinker

panels.title: T023a Frequency histogram of used Knowledge INTERLINKERs per INT. ID/NAME

targets.rawSql:
select coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct id)
from asset
group by coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T024a Num. used INTERLINKERs (all types) per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select b.coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct a.id)
from internalasset a
inner join asset b on (a.id = b.id)
where a.knowledgeinterlinker_id is not null
group by b.coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T024b Num. used Knowledge INTERLINKERs per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select b.coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct a.id)
from internalasset a
inner join asset b on (a.id = b.id)
where a.softwareinterlinker_id is not null and a.knowledgeinterlinker_id is null
group by b.coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T024c Num. used internal SW INTERLINKERs per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct id)
from asset
where type = 'externalasset'
group by coproductionprocess_id;

panels.title: T024d Num. used external SW INTERLINKERs per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select a.schema_used, count(distinct b.id)
from coproductionprocess a
inner join asset b on (a.id=b.coproductionprocess_id)
group by a.schema_used
order by count desc;

panels.title: T025 Num. used INTERLINKERs per schema TYPE

targets.rawSql:
select b.phase_id, a.schema_used, count(distinct b.id)
from coproductionprocess a
inner join asset b on (a.id=b.coproductionprocess_id)
inner join phase c on (c.id=b.phase_id)
group by b.phase_id, a.schema_used
order by count desc;

panels.title: T027 INTERLINKER IDs used per co-prod. phase per schema type

targets.queryText: select count( distinct(id) ) as num_Assets from coproduction.public.asset

targets.rawSql:
select coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct id)
from asset
group by coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T032a Number of created assets (all INTER types) per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select a.coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct b.knowledgeinterlinker_id)
from asset a
inner join internalasset b on (a.id = b.id)
where b.knowledgeinterlinker_id is not null
group by a.coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T032b Number of created assets for KNOWLEDGE type INTERL. per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select a.coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct b.softwareinterlinker_id)
from asset a
inner join internalasset b on (a.id = b.id)
where b.knowledgeinterlinker_id is null
group by a.coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T032c Number of created assets for Internal SW type INTERL. per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select a.coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct b.id)
from asset a
inner join externalasset b on (a.id = b.id)
group by a.coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T032d Number of created assets for External SW type INTERL. per co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select knowledgeinterlinker_id, count(id)
from internalasset
where knowledgeinterlinker_id is not null
group by knowledgeinterlinker_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T033b Number of created assets per Cat_ID/Name of INTERLINKER

targets.rawSql:
select softwareinterlinker_id, count(id)
from internalasset
where knowledgeinterlinker_id is null
group by softwareinterlinker_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T033c Number of created assets per Cat_ID/Name of INTERLINKER

targets.rawSql:
select uri, count(distinct id)
from externalasset
group by uri
order by count desc;

panels.title: T033d Number of created assets per Cat_ID/Name of INTERLINKER

targets.rawSql:
select creator_id, count(distinct id)
from asset
group by creator_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T034 Number of created assets per user_ID

targets.rawSql:
select u.full_name, -- a.creator_id as user_id, 
       count(distinct a.id) as num_assets
from asset a
left join "user" u on u.id = a.creator_id
group by u.full_name
order by num_assets desc

panels.title: T035 Number of created assets vs. time
T036 Number of all operations on any asset (C.R.U.D.)
T037 Number of asset operations per co-prod process
T038 Number of asset operations per TYPE / Cat_ID of INTERLINKER
T039 Number of asset operations per user_ID
T040 Number of asset operations vs. time
T051 Number of users participating in more than one co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select id, count(coproductionprocess_id)
from asset
group by id
having count(coproductionprocess_id) > 1;

panels.title: T052 Number of INTERLINKERs used in more than one co-prod. process

targets.rawSql:
select coproductionprocess_id, count(distinct team_id)
from permission
group by coproductionprocess_id
order by count desc;

panels.title: T054 Number of teams per coprod process

targets.rawSql:
select type, count(id) 
from team
group by type
order by count desc;

panels.title: T055 Number of teams per role (team type)
T056 Number of team types (roles) within web portal

targets.rawSql:
select count(distinct id)
from  organization;

panels.title: T057 Number of organizations in web portal

targets.queryText: select count(distinct(id)) as num_org from coproduction.public.organization
